application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) to configure Smartcar for your vehicle:

1. Go to [Applications]({oauth_creds_url}) and your application from the list.
1. Choose **Configuration** from the side menu.
1. Copy the **Client ID**.
1. Regenerate and copy the the **Client Secret**.
1. Add `{redirect_url}` under *Authorized redirect URI*.

abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.cloud_not_connected: Not connected to Home Assistant Cloud.
abort.duplicate_vehicles: Vehicles may only be set up once. The following VINs {vins} are already configured.
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.no_vehicles: No vehicles were available to setup.
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.
abort.wrong_vehicles: The vehicles must match the original selections. Choose the vehicles with VIN(s): {vins}.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up a [webhook with Smartcar]({smartcar_url}). Use the following URL:

`{webhook_url}`

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

error.no_scopes: At least one scope needs to be selected
error.extraneous_management_token: Do not provide application management token unless using webhooks

reauth_confirm.description: The Smartcar integration needs to re-authenticate your account
reauth_confirm.title: Authentication expired for {name}

data.application_management_token: Token: only provide if using webhooks

webhooks.description:
Provide your _Application Management Token_ from your [Smartcar account]({smartcar_url}) to use webhooks.

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.
webhooks.title: Smartcar configuration

data.control_climate: Set the status and settings of the vehicle’s climate control system
data.control_navigation: Send commands to the vehicle’s navigation system
data.control_pin: Modify a PIN and enable the PIN to Drive feature for the vehicle.
data.control_trunk: Open a vehicle’s trunk or frunk
data.read_battery: Get EV/PHEV battery level, capacity & current range
data.read_charge_events: Receive notifications for events associated with charging
data.read_charge_locations: Access previous charging locations and their associated charging configurations
data.read_charge_records: Read charge records and associated billing information
data.read_charge: Get details on whether the car is plugged in and charging
data.read_climate: Read the status and settings of the vehicle’s climate control system
data.read_compass: Read the compass direction the vehicle is facing
data.read_diagnostics: Read a vehicle’s system status and/or Diagnostic Trouble Codes
data.read_extended_vehicle_info: Read vehicle configuration information from a vehicle
data.read_security: Get details on whether doors, windows & more are enabled
data.read_service_history: Read a vehicle’s dealer service history
data.read_thermometer: Read temperatures from inside and outside the vehicle
data.read_user_profile: Read the information associated with a user’s connected services account profile such as their "email": "and phone number."

scopes.description: Select the permissions you would like to grant
scopes.title: Permission selection

batch_update_error.message: An error occurred while retrieving vehicle state from the Smartcar API: {error}

abort.cloud_not_connected: Not connected to Home Assistant Cloud.

error.extraneous_management_token: Do not provide application management token unless using webhooks

data.application_management_token: Token: only provide if using webhooks

webhooks.description:
Provide your _Application Management Token_ from your [Smartcar account]({smartcar_url}) to use webhooks.

To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up a [webhook with Smartcar]({smartcar_url}). Use the following URL:

`{webhook_url}`

If the above URL indicates that webhooks are not enabled, revisit this configuration screen after completing the setup to get the URL.

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.
webhooks.title: Smartcar configuration
